title: Biden to Warn Putin Off Invasion of Ukraine
sub_head: U.S. president to speak Monday with European allies ahead of Tuesday talk with Russian leader
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden will speak Monday with European allies ahead of a call with Vladimir Putin in which he will warn the Russian president not to invade Ukraine, officials said.
“He will make clear that there will be very real costs should Russia choose to proceed, but he will also make clear that there is an effective way forward with respect to diplomacy,” a senior administration official said.
